analysis.narrative:
ðŸ“Š **Consensus:** Markets are navigating conflicting signals with cautious optimism dominating near-term sentiment (73% bullish in news, 63% bullish on X), but conviction remains medium due to underlying structural concerns and momentum divergences. Bullish positioning is concentrated in forward-looking narratives rather than broad confirmation.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) Rate policy uncertainty and expectations for monetary accommodation driving tactical strength in growth/tech sectors; (2) Momentum divergence and breadth deterioration signaling potential exhaustion despite headline strengthâ€”only 116 stocks showing positive momentum vs. normal 150+; (3) Leverage and deleveraging dynamics in commodities (silver exhaustion at 182% YTD gains) and crypto positioning creating vulnerability to forced liquidations.

ðŸŽ¯ **Levels:** SPY ($690.31): Call Wall $700 (146k OI - active hedging at 1.4% away), Put Wall $640 (153k OI - dormant at 7.3% away). Max Pain $686. Near support: $670 (45k OI - active), $645 (126k OI - dormant). QQQ ($623.89): Call Wall $630 (33k OI - active at 1.0% away), Put Wall $590 (164k OI - dormant at 5.4% away). Max Pain $621. risk_factors: Breadth deterioration (116 positive momentum stocks vs. 150+ norm) suggests rally lacks conviction
Silver and leveraged commodity positions vulnerable to forced unwinding; inverse ETF volume elevated
Structural headwinds (software demand weakness, regulatory enforcement, geopolitical tail risks) not yet priced into bullish headlines
Year-end options positioning and defensive hedging suggest traders not fully committing to continuation
Margin requirement changes and deleveraging mechanics could trigger sharp reversals despite sentiment alignment
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Watch $700 call wall for resistance activation (146k OI actively defended); hold of $670 support (45k OI active hedging) required to maintain bullish structure. QQQ: $630 and $625 resistance levels both active (33k and 29k OI); hold above $620 (near max pain) suggested. Risk-reward currently compressed between active levels.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Bullish structure supported by put wall at $640 (153k OI); path of least resistance toward $700 call wall if support holds. QQQ: Potential extension toward $640 (31k OI) if $625 resistance breaks; major support floor at $590 (164k OI - dormant until approached). Key risk: if either index closes below $670 (SPY) or $620 (QQQ), momentum deterioration thesis gains credibility and swing bias reverts to bearish.

regime.label: NEUTRAL
regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.

action.summary: NEUTRAL: No clear edge. Cash is a position.
